name: "Once Stood Against the Tide of Dark Waters Like Bedrock..."
title: "Once Stood Against the Tide of Dark Waters Like Bedrock..."
desc: "And in the realm's darkest hour, those who had to protect their homeland had little room to be fussy anyway."
in_play_description: When Action Phase begins: Black Serpent Knight: Rockbreaker Ax Geo Application.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against Black Serpent Knight: Rockbreaker Ax at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Black Serpent Knight: Rockbreaker Ax, equip this card.
When this card is played or the Action Phase begins: Black Serpent Knight: Rockbreaker AxPerform Geo Application.
(You must have Black Serpent Knight: Rockbreaker Ax in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
